text: E.S. Uma assumed charge as the Superintendent of Police, Tiruchi on Friday. She succeeds S. Rajeswari who has been posted as Superintendent of Police, Pudukottai. A 1999-batch Tamil Nadu Police Service officer, she joined the force as Deputy Superintendent of Police with the first assignment being in Tiruchi in the Prohibition and Enforcement Unit. After serving in various sub divisions as DSP, she was promoted as Additional SP and SP.
title: New SP takes charge
